cause:
1.Non-homogeneous distribution of colorant; accumulation of colorant; unsuitable color batch; alignment orientation of the usually inorganic pigments by flow processes;thermal pigment damage.
2."Dead spots" in the plasticizing unit or hot runner system.
3.Contamination
correction:
1.Use of suitable colorants and batches; ensure good homogenization and dispersion; avoid thermal overloading.
2.Avoid dead spots in the plasticizing unit or hot runner system.
3.Ensure good cleaning of the plasticizing unit.
